U

update(GameContainer, int) - Method in class malp.DemonSkies.GameEngine
Updates the game state and returns whether or not the game is still running or over.
update() - Method in class malp.Entities.Arrow
Moves the arrow at the appropriate Arrow.angle and determines whether the arrow's lifespan is up.
update() - Method in class malp.Entities.Entity
Update the entity.
update() - Method in class malp.Entities.Player
This method is empty, as this entity is controlled via peripherals such as a mouse and keyboard.
update() - Method in class malp.Entities.Skull
Translates the skull based on the Skull.angle.
update(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, int) - Method in class malp.States.MainMenu
Updates the game state.

Updates the game state.
update(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, int) - Method in class malp.States.Shop
Updates the game state.
updateCount - Variable in class malp.DemonSkies.GameEngine
The update count tracks the number of times GameEngine.update(GameContainer, int) has been called this round.
upgrade(UpgradeType) - Method in class malp.DemonSkies.GameEngine
Upgrades a specified upgrade type.
UPGRADE_PRICE - Static variable in class malp.DemonSkies.GameEngine
The Constant UPGRADE_PRICE represents the price an upgrade tier should cost.
upgradeText - Variable in class malp.States.Shop
The upgrade text to display in the middle of the screen upon hovering over a button.
UpgradeType - Enum in malp.DemonSkies
The Enum UpgradeType represents the player upgrades available.
